page.title: 09Health Service in Middleton
page.content: Doctors from the Youlgrave practice and the District Nurse will call as necessary. Major surgery and specialist care are undertaken at Chesterfield Royal Hospital, Calow. Post operative and minor cases are treated at Bakewell Cottage Hospital and the Whitworth at Darley Dale. Considerable difficulties are experienced for non car owners in attending these hospitals due to lack of transport. Emergency transport is by ambulance, but a hospital visit can take all day if using public transport. The hospital at Parwich provides short term care for infirm elderly people. Dental treatment can be obtained in Bakewell. District Nurses, Health Visitors and Home Helps provide domestic services when required.
